title: Understanding Power Pivot
text: Power Pivot is a powerful tool in Excel that allows you to work with large datasets. It helps in importing, comparing, and analyzing data from various sources.

title: Key Features of Power Pivot
text: Power Pivot enables you to create data models, establish relationships, and perform calculations on large datasets. It is especially useful for business intelligence and data analysis.

hintAnswer: enables you to import and compare large amounts of data from multiple sources to build analytical relationships
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Which of the following best describes the function of Power Pivot?
choices: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
enables you to import and compare large amounts of data from multiple sources to build analytical relationships
creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
